artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio; Mill: Bolan Fabrics; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Non-directional pattern with its fundamental texture interest creates a pre-shrunk upholstery of great strength and versatility.lt brown & metallic silver warp.. Tan, greys & off white weft.  Plain weave variation. Machine edged, both sides.
